# Resource `morpheus_instance`



## Example Usage

```terraform

}
```

- **cloud** (String)
- **group** (String)

- **metadata** (Block List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--metadata))

- **volumes** (Block List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--volumes))
